file_content.text: The Empire can't launch a single fighter now without us knowing. Thanks again.
Sergeant Durren. I heard your team tracks Imperial ships. These transponders might help.
These are straight out of Imperial aircraft. We haven't even been able to get near the wrecks.
We'll start decoding these immediately. I don't know how you found them, but thanks.
Can't brief you, sorry. Need to keep an eye out for Imperial aircraft.
